targets.query: SELECT (mean("inodes_used") * 100) / mean("inodes_total") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "path" =~ /^$path$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s)*8 as "in" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s) as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s)  as "out"  FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s) as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s)  as "out"  FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: path
list.name: path
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path"
